text: Baluna, ‘he manusa! Niscaya ami tomadera sabara prati allah‌ra rasula [1], yini asamanasamuha o yaminera sarbabhaumatbera adhikari. Tini chara kono satya ilaha ne'i; tini jibita karena o mrtyu ghatana. Kaje'i tomara imana ana allah‌ra prati o tamra rasula um'mi nabira prati yini allaha o tamra banisamuhe imana rakhena. Ara tomara tara anusarana kara, yate tomara hidayataprapta ha'o.’
